languages.text: Старый сслит Злоба не рискнул возвращаться в Комморру из-за культа Губительной жажды, мстившего всем, кто помогал Вольному Торговцу. Сколотив в Просторе экипаж из осколков Опустошительной бури, он занялся пиратством и вспомнил былую жажду битвы, скинув добрую сотню лет словно змеиную шкуру.

The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.
languages.original_text: Старый сслит Злоба не рискнул возвращаться в Комморру из-за культа Губительной жажды, мстившего всем, кто помогал Вольному Торговцу. Сколотив в Просторе экипаж из осколков Опустошительной бури, он занялся пиратством и вспомнил былую жажду битвы, скинув добрую сотню лет словно змеиную шкуру.

traits.locale_text: Old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, as the cult of the Fatal Thirst took its vengeance on everyone who helped the Rogue Trader. Forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest, he took to piracy. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good century of age like a snake shades its skin.

Old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, as the cult of the Fatal Thirst took its vengeance on everyone who helped the Rogue Trader. Forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest, he took to piracy. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good century of age like a snake shades its skin.

The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the cult of the Fatal Thirst took its vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle seemed to shed a good century off his age, like a snake skin.

The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the cult of the Fatal Thirst took its vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle seemed to shed a good century off his age, like a snake skin.

The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.

The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.

languages.text: 老蛇人“恶棍”没有冒险回到科摩罗，因为致命饥渴教派正在疯狂报复所有帮助过行商浪人的人。他选择从事海盗活动，利用狂风阴谋团的残留资源组建了他自己的队伍。他再次燃起了对战斗的渴望，看起来整整年轻了一百岁，就像蛇蜕去了死皮一样。
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.

traits.locale_text: 老蛇人“恶棍”没有冒险回到科摩罗，因为致命饥渴教派正在疯狂报复所有帮助过行商浪人的人。他选择从事海盗活动，利用狂风阴谋团的残留资源组建了他自己的队伍。他再次燃起了对战斗的渴望，看起来整整年轻了一百岁，就像蛇蜕去了死皮一样。

languages.text: Der alte Sslyth Tücke riskierte es nicht, nach Commorragh zurückzukehren, wo der Kult des Fatalen Dursts sich an allen rächte, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} geholfen hatten. Er wurde Pirat und bildete aus den Überresten des plündernden Sturms eine Crew. Durch das Wiederauflebenlassen seiner alten Leidenschaft für den Kampf schien er ein gutes Jahrhundert abzulegen wie eine Schlange ihre Haut.
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.

traits.locale_text: Der alte Sslyth Tücke riskierte es nicht, nach Commorragh zurückzukehren, wo der Kult des Fatalen Dursts sich an allen rächte, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} geholfen hatten. Er wurde Pirat und bildete aus den Überresten des plündernden Sturms eine Crew. Durch das Wiederauflebenlassen seiner alten Leidenschaft für den Kampf wirkte er viel jünger, er schien ein gutes Jahrhundert abzulegen wie eine Schlange ihre Haut.

languages.text: Malice ne se risqua pas à retour à Commorragh, où le Culte de la Soif Fatale faisait couler le sang de tous ceux qui avaient aidé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Le vieux Sslyth forma un équipage avec les rescapés de la Tempête ravageuse et se lança dans la piraterie. En ravivant sa soif de combat, il sembla rajeunir d'un bon siècle, comme un serpent abandonnant sa vieille mue desséchée.
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.

traits.locale_text: Malice ne se risqua pas à retour à Commorragh, où le Culte de la Soif Fatale faisait couler le sang de tous ceux qui avaient aidé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Le vieux Sslyth forma un équipage avec les rescapés de la Tempête ravageuse et se lança dans la piraterie. En ravivant sa soif de combat, il rajeunit d'un bon siècle, comme un serpent abandonnant sa vieille mue desséchée.

languages.text: El viejo Sslyth Malicia no se arriesgó a volver a Commorragh, donde el Culto de la Sed Letal se estaba vengando de todos los que habían ayudado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Se dedicó a la piratería tras formar una tripulación con los supervivientes de la Tempestad Asoladora. Reavivar su vieja pasión por la batalla hizo que pareciera un siglo más joven, como si hubiera mudado de piel.
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.

traits.locale_text: El viejo Sslyth Malicia no se arriesgó a volver a Commorragh, donde el Culto de la Sed Letal se vengó de todos los que habían ayudado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Se dedicó a la piratería tras formar una tripulación con los supervivientes de la Tempestad Asoladora. Reavivar su vieja pasión por la batalla hizo que pareciera un siglo más joven, como si hubiera mudado de piel.

languages.text: 年老いたススリス・マリスはコモラフに戻る危険を冒さなかった。コモラフでは「宿命の渇き」というカルトが、自由開拓者に手を貸した者すべてに復讐を仕掛けていた。彼は海賊行為に手を染め、リーヴィング・テンペストの残党からクルーを結成した。戦いへの渇望を再燃させることは、蛇の皮を剥ぐように、彼の年齢を100歳も若返らせるようだった。
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.

traits.locale_text: 年老いたススリス・マリスはコモラフに戻る危険を冒さなかった。コモラフでは「宿命の渇き」というカルトが、ローグトレーダーに手を貸した者すべてに復讐を仕掛けていた。彼は海賊行為に手を染め、リーヴィング・テンペストの残党からクルーを結成した。戦いへの渇望を再燃させることは、蛇の皮を剥ぐように、彼の年齢を100歳も若返らせるようだった。

languages.text: İhtiyar Sslyth Melanet, Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın Hür Tacir'e yardım eden herkesten intikam aldığı Commorragh'a dönme riskine girmedi. Korsanlığa yöneldi ve Müfteris Kasırga'nın kalıntılarından oluşan bir mürettebat kurdu. Eski muharebe aşkı yeniden alevlendi ve âdeta bir yılanın derisinden kurtulması gibi, en az bir yüz yaşını kenara bırakmış gibi görünüyordu.
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice did not risk returning to Commorragh, where the Cult of the Fatal Thirst was exacting vengeance on everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. He took to piracy, forming a crew from the remnants of the Reaving Tempest. Rekindling his old thirst for battle, he seemed to shed a good hundred years off his age like a snake skin.

Korsanlığa yöneldi ve Müfteris Kasırga'nın kalıntılarından oluşan bir mürettebat kurdu. Eski muharebe aşkı yeniden alevlendi ve âdeta bir yılanın derisinden kurtulması gibi, en az bir yüz yaşını kenara bırakmış gibi görünüyordu.
